name: Tiny Drummer
description:
Welcome to Tiny Drummer, This is a story about a spider name Tiny, who is passionate about playing music. However,  he is so small for human-size drum set. Luckily, he lives in an abandoned warehouse where a large number of debris falling down. Help him beat the drum and turn the music on.

This game is a submission for Mini Jam 123 : Web . You can visit it here https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-123-web

Controls

WASD : to move

First SPACE : set the first position of the instrument

Second SPACE : depend on the distance from the first SPACE, it will place an instrument according to the color circle web. 

  • Inside Red ring : Removes the last instruments (double SPACE)
  • Inside Yellow ring : Places a Hi-hat
  • Inside Green ring : Places a Green Snare
  • Inside Blue ring : Places a Blue Tom
  • Outside Blue ring : Places a non-bouncy string

Continuously bumping to a instrument to remove it

R : Remove placed all instrument
